sourcesContent:
{{ server.name }}
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { ServersService, servertype } from './servers.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-servers', templateUrl: './servers.component.html', styleUrls: ['./servers.component.css'] }) export class ServersComponent implements OnInit { servers: servertype[] = []; constructor(private serversService: ServersService) { } ngOnInit() { this.servers = this.serversService.getServers(); } }
